ISSUE.TITLE: Customers. Add a column indicating in which store a customer registered
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: It can be helpful for reports. We can display this field (static label) on a customer details page. But we should do it only when we have two or more stores configured. Upgrade. Set it to 0 if we have only two or more stores. Set to the only existing store ID if we have only one store. If set to 0, then hide this field. If store cannot be loaded (e.g. deleted), then also hide it. Don't forget to update CodeFirstInstallationService Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/44504/multistore-registered-customers.aspx
